title: Safety vs. Speed Dilemma in Baby Formula Production
itunes:title: Safety vs. Speed Dilemma in Baby Formula Production
description:
Laura Modi, Co-Founder and CEO of Bobbie, discusses solving the infant formula shortage.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Kriti Gupta. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
